name: Unforgiving Lust Chapter 1a Mini Update
description:
A youthful completed his school, he leaves his home town to the city to remain in with her sister for 14 days, things got complicated among him and her sister and he was forced to find a new apartment while waiting.
This is a mini update for the left behind scene on Chapter 1
Changelog:Changed the verification picture from the start of the gameChanged button locationsAdded map system
